title: Add the ability to set shard and collection in web gui when adding a shard
description: Currently the latest web gui allows you to add an additional core but does not allow you to specify the shard or collection that core should be part of.  In the core admin view when adding a core we should expose options to set these values when creating a core.

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content:
we should expose options to set these values when creating a core.

But they should probably only be visible if in cloud mode.
